message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I think we can find a better price. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $1000000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product.
I understand that you're still not satisfied with the price, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $980000.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $920000 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'll make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $990000.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $930000 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'll sell the product to you for $980000, and that's my final offer.
I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $910000 for the product.
